E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/29/1988
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Jeff Little



Date: Friday, 5/30/1988
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Jim Slaton

Date: Tuesday, 6/17/1988
Subject: Status of Woody Williams
Dear Sir,
Woody Williams has problems at AA Birmingham Barons!
He has an ERA of 5.64, so you might
want to demote him soon, before his attitude suffers!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 6/19/1988
Subject: Progress of Bill Risley

He has an ERA of 3.99, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

me in the rotation?

Regards,
Bill Gullickson
